results.title: Air crossroads - London
results.creator_credit: Basic Films, Film Workshop, Central Office of Information and John Arnold
results.brief_description: London is the busiest airport in the world; 38 airlines use it and some 600 planes arrive and depart every 24 hours. Passengers from many nations pass through the airport and are assisted in every way posible by an efficient staff. The control tower and servicing staff are in operation seven days of the week, 24 hours a day. When passenger planes are not so numerous heavy freight planes take over. Radio control enables planes to land and take off in foggy weather and at night.

results.title: Air crew
results.creator_credit: Geoffrey Thompson and Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau
results.brief_description: The training of pilots and navigators for careers in the Royal Australian Air Force is described in detail. Young men with strong mathematical aptitudes excel in these fields, especially navigation. Training is carried out in a number of RAAF schools in different parts of the Commonwealth. The film closes with an account of life on the Australian base at Butterworth in Malaya.

results.title: Air Conditioned Comfort
results.brief_description: A coarse, insensitive family drives through the National Parks in a luxurious camper, oblivious to the natural beauty around them. The family’s only concern is in looking for real estate, finding the next burger stand and locating the next rest stop. For them the forest is just a place to toss gum wrappers. At the end of the day’s travel, as they are parked in their camper, the family suddenly finds the tables turned in a surprising climax

results.title: Air at work
results.creator_credit: Michael Latham, Christopher Haws and Video Arts
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Start Here: Adventures into Science”.
This program presents experiments that demonstrate the varying forces that are created when air moves. Demonstrates the theory of flight and the creation of weather patterns.

results.title: Air all around us
results.brief_description: This film is designed to implement the study of air by developing the following concepts: air is all around us; air is a substance, ie it occupies space, and can be weighed; air exerts pressure from all sides; air expands when it is heated and contracts when it is cooled; air can be compressed.

results.title: Air
results.creator_credit: John Walker and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Environment in crisis: problems of conservation”.
Studies the affects of air pollution on health and property. Natural pollutants existed long before man but harmful pollution did not start until the start of the Industrial Revolutions. This film explains what has caused man-made pollution and what is being done to solve the problem through technological and legislative controls.

results.title: Aimee & Jaguar = Aimee and Jaguar
results.creator_credit: Senator Film Production, Hanno Huth, Gunter Rohrbach and Max Farberbock
results.brief_description: Based on the memoirs of Lilly Wust as recorded by Erica Fischer in her best-selling book, published in 1994, “Aimee and Jaguar” is a compelling love story that transgresses socially and politically imposed regulations around gender, race and culture. It tells the true story of two German women, one Jewish and one Aryan, who dared to fall deeply in love with each other at the height of the Holocaust. 1943- Lilly is a model bourgeois German mother of four children who indulges in affairs while husband is away fighting on the Eastern front. When she receives a love letter signed ‘Jaguar,’ she suspects a male admirer. But it is from the audacious Felice, a Jewish Resistance fighter, who initiates the passionate love affair that ignites between the two women amidst the bombing raids and anti-Semitic persecution. Inevitably it is a romance that is destined to end in tragedy. An immensely moving period drama, that also offers a visually impressive evocation of life in Berlin during WWII. In German with English subtitles.
